data.title: Victory Check
data.statement: You are playing a game of <<Tic Tac Toe>>. The current state of the board is represented by a {{3x3}} grid. The grid contains {{X}}, {{O}}, or {{.}} (empty cell) in each cell. Your task is to determine if player can win the game by placing one more mark on the board.
data.constraints: The input board is a valid <<uncompleted>> Tic Tac Toe configuration.

<<Line 1:>> Contains a character, representing whose turn it is ({{X}} or {{O}}).
<<Next 3 lines:>> contain the current state of the Tic Tac Toe board. Each line consists of three characters, either {{X}}, {{O}}, or {{.}} (empty cell).
data.outputDescription:

<<indexing of rows and columns is 0-based.>>

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are playing a game of Tic Tac Toe. The current state of the board is represented by a 3x3 grid. The grid contains X, O, or . (empty cell) in each cell. Your task is to determine if player can win the game by placing one more mark on the board.
Input
Line 1: Contains a character, representing whose turn it is (X or O).
Next 3 lines: contain the current state of the Tic Tac Toe board. Each line consists of three characters, either X, O, or . (empty cell).
Output
If the player can win with one mark, print the row and column of where the mark should be added, separated by a space . Otherwise, print Cannot win with one move.
indexing of rows and columns is 0-based.
Constraints
The input board is a valid uncompleted Tic Tac Toe configuration.
Example
Input
X
X.X
OO.
...
Output
0 1
